snippet: Dwyane Wade’s miss, which would have ended the Knicks’ season, was the final play in a string of seven dramatic possessions.
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade’s miss, which would have ended the Knicks’ season, was the final play in a string of seven dramatic possessions.

headline.seo: Dwyane Wade’s Miss Ends Game’s Suspense With a Clang
headline.main: After Suspenseful Plays, Game Ends With a Clang
headline.print_headline: After Suspenseful Plays, Game Ends With a Clang
